analyzed: pi sh'a tsa ha na ma s'a dha nam /

original: sha za mo ha na ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: sha za mo ha na ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of the Piśācī Hanamā

original: aom ha na ne tshin ni hi li hi li sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ha na ne tshin ni hi li hi li sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hanane tsiṇi hilī hilī svāhā.

original: zhes so // bstan pa'i rgyun ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa ni /
analyzed: zhes so // bstan pa'i rgyun ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa ni /
translated: The means of accomplishment called “the one who does not break the continuity of the teaching” is as follows:

original: ba ru ra'i shing gi 'og tu thun gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas /
analyzed: ba ru ra'i shing gi 'og tu thun gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas /
translated: Under a bāruṇa tree, one should recite [the mantra] one hundred and eight times in each of three sessions.

original: lha mo'i gzugs can ma'i 'dre mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha mo'i gzugs can ma'i 'dre mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: A ghost in the form of a goddess will come.

original: des 'jig rten gsum na ci yod pa rnam par shod par byed cing /
analyzed: des 'jig rten gsum na ci yod pa rnam par shod par byed cing /
translated: She will tell of everything that exists in the three worlds.

original: di na ra stong phrag ster ro //
analyzed: di na ra stong phrag ster ro //
translated: She will give a thousand dinars.

original: ha na ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: ha na ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The means of accomplishment called Hanamā is complete.
